text:
Perplexity AI is the death of Google.

Two copy & paste prompts to feel it:

1. Strategic Roadmap for AI integration

☑ Deep Research Mode

"I am the Chief Strategy Officer at [Company Name], a [industry] organization with [revenue/size] facing the challenge of implementing enterprise AI transformation while maintaining operational continuity and competitive advantage.

Conduct a comprehensive 18-month roadmap analysis that includes:

STRATEGIC FRAMEWORK:
- Current AI maturity assessment benchmarks for our industry
- Implementation sequence prioritization (quick wins vs. long-term initiatives)
- Change management protocols for workforce adaptation
- ROI projection models with risk-adjusted scenarios

COMPETITIVE INTELLIGENCE:
- Analysis of AI adoption strategies from top 5 industry leaders in [specific industry]
- Emerging AI technologies with potential disruption impact in next 24 months
- Partnership ecosystem mapping (AI vendors, implementation partners, integration platforms)

EXECUTION BLUEPRINT:
- Phase-gate implementation timeline with milestone dependencies
- Resource allocation framework (budget, personnel, technology infrastructure)
- Success metrics and KPI tracking mechanisms
- Risk mitigation strategies for common AI transformation pitfalls

Create a comprehensive strategic document with:
- AI readiness scorecard comparison vs. industry benchmarks
- Investment timeline with expected ROI curves
- Risk-benefit analysis matrix for each implementation phase
- Vendor evaluation criteria with weighted scoring models

2. Due Diligence Research

☑ Deep Research + File Upload

"As Principal at [Firm], I’m vetting [Target] ([industry]) for a potential [acquisition/investment] (~$[amount]).

Please upload all key files (financials, filings, industry studies).

FINANCIAL
 • Benchmark revenue model
 • Identify margin-lift & cost gaps
 • Track working-capital / cash-cycle
 • Surface hidden legal / reg liabilities

MARKET
 • Size & validate TAM growth
 • Map moat & defensibility
 • Check customer concentration/retention
 • Rate tech / IP strength

OPERATIONS
 • Assess leadership & key-person risk
 • Score scalability & automation potential
 • Stress-test supply chain & vendor mix
 • Review IT & cyber posture

DELIVERABLES:
☑ IC deck with 1-page exec summary & go/no-go
☑ Sector comps & multiples
☑ Dynamic model (sensitivities + scenarios)
☑ 100-day integration / value-creation plan

Export as a PDF pack including management-interview questions and post-close KPIs."

___

Access Deep Research Mode: Go to perplexity and select "Deep Research" from the mode dropdown.

Upload Supporting Documents: Use the "+ Attach" button to upload relevant files (PDFs, documents...) for enhanced analysis.

Customize Your Context: Replace all bracketed placeholders with your specific company details, industry, and objectives.

Export Professional Reports: Use the built-in Export → PDF feature to save your reports.
